instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED] Distorted video after liquid damage...MacBook Air 2013
threads.message:
I'm looking to buy this MacBook air, It's a 2013 13"...

Is this "distortion" possible without a cracked or damaged LCD? Seller said it showed up that way after liquid damage and wasn't cracked...

Anyone run into this situation or it was cracked and the seller didn't realize it...

threads.title: [SOLVED] Distorted video after liquid damage...MacBook Air 2013
threads.message: Seems to be a bad LCD and yes it could be water damage, corrosion on flex cable that connects the panel with control board
